entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
